name: Way of the Boozer
description:
Take control of a sacred Demon Slayer, as he takes part in his journey to rid the world of its evil. While famous for his skills and abilities, his way of working can be...unconventional.

Created as a submission for Slavic Game Jam 2020

How to play:

WASD - Movement / Aiming

Left Mouse - Throw

Right Mouse - Aim
